titles.title: Streamlining Federal Cybersecurity Regulations Act
Streamlining Federal Cybersecurity Regulations Act
To establish an interagency committee to harmonize regulatory regimes in the United States relating to cybersecurity, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Protection.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Homeland Security, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
